Pre-Game Insights: England will be without their regular ODI captain, Jos Buttler, who has been sidelined with a calf injury since the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 in June. Taking on the leadership role, Liam Livingstone will captain the team in Buttler’s absence.

West Indies, led by Shai Hope, are aiming for a bounce-back performance after their 2-1 ODI and T20I series defeats in Sri Lanka. Cricket West Indies has made a single change to their ODI squad, bringing in left-handed batter Shimron Hetmyer in place of Alick Athanaze.

With the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 approaching, the England-West Indies ODI series holds strategic importance. Both teams will aim to fine-tune their lineups and address gaps, making this series a critical opportunity to assess form and build momentum.
